member.name: T:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeResult
member.summary: Describes the result of a change which has been applied to the server.
member.remarks: This is returned by calling SaveChanges() on a DistributedUnitOfWork. When the changes are batched, one result is returned for each batch sent to the server.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeResult.Success
member.summary: Indicates if the call was successful.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeResult.UpdatedIdentifiers
member.summary: Returns a list of identifiers which have been updated as a result of the change.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeResult.ValidationErrors
member.summary: Returns any validation errors which were triggered on the server as part of this change.

member.name: T:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IdentifierData
member.summary: Holds an identifier value for an entity so it can be used for tracking an identifier change as part of a DistributedUnitOfWork change set.
member.remarks: When sent across the wire the tracking identifier is used for syncronization between the client and the server.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IdentifierData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IdentifierData.#ctor(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Entity)
member.summary: Initializes the identifier holder with the associated entity.
member.param: The entity used to initialize the identifier value.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IdentifierData.TrackingIdentifier
member.summary: The tracking value used to syncronize the client and server within the scope of a change request.
member.remarks: The client is responsible for creating the tracking identifier value.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IdentifierData.Identifier
member.summary: The identifier value.
member.remarks: When initialized with an existing entity this value will be set to the internal Id value of the Entity.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IdentifierData.AssociatedEntity
member.summary: The entity associated with this IdentifierData instance.
member.remarks: Not part of the WCF contract.

member.name: T:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.ValidationFailureMessage
member.summary: Holds the details of an error message which can be associated with an entity based on the tracking identifier.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.ValidationFailureMessage.TrackingIdentifier
member.summary: The tracking value used to syncronize the client and server within the scope of a change request.
member.remarks: The client is responsible for creating the tracking identifier value.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.ValidationFailureMessage.ErrorMessage
member.summary: The text description of the error that has occurred.

member.name: T:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.LightSpeedDistributedException
member.summary: Represents a general error that has occured within the LightSpeed distributed extensions

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.LightSpeedDistributedException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.LightSpeedDistributedException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.LightSpeedDistributedException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.LightSpeedDistributedException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
member.exception: The class name is null or is zero (0).

member.name: T:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeBatch
member.summary: Describes a batch of individual DistributedChangeDetail changes.
member.remarks: This is the scope at which a UnitOfWork.SaveChanges() operates. When communicating with the server the SaveChanges() call will be broken down into a number of batches, one for each entity type and then up to the size specified by LightSpeedContext.UpdateBatchSize.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeBatch.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeBatch.Add(Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeDetail)
member.summary: Adds a change set to this batch.
member.param: The change set being added to the batch.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeBatch.EntityType
member.summary: The entity type for this batch.
member.remarks: This is only used locally and is not shipped across the wire.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeBatch.TrackingIdentifier
member.summary: A unique tracking identifier for this batch of changes.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeBatch.Details
member.summary: The individual change sets contained within this batch.

member.name: T:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeDetail
member.summary: Describes a set of changes to an entity to be processed by a DistributedUnitOfWork service.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeDetail.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeDetail.AssociatedEntity
member.summary: The entity associated with this change set.
member.remarks: This is for local handling and is not sent over the wire.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeDetail.TrackingIdentifier
member.summary: A unique tracking identifier for this change set which is used by the server when responding to requests.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeDetail.TypeName
member.summary: The fully qualified type of the entity being operated on, used at the server to construct an entity instance.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeDetail.State
member.summary: The current EntityState of the entity.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeDetail.Identifier
member.summary: The current Id identifier value for the entity.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeDetail.ValueData
member.summary: The set of values held by the entity.
member.remarks: This represents all of the ValueModel values.

member.name: T:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.ValueModelData
member.summary: Holder class for ValueModel data for use with a DistributedChangeDetail instance.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.ValueModelData.Key
member.summary: The name of the value property which this value is for.

member.name: P:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.ValueModelData.Value
member.summary: The value being held.

member.name: T:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWorkService
member.summary: A WCF service which hosts a UnitOfWork making it available for distributed access as specified in the IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.
member.remarks: This service can either be self hosted by starting it up via a ServiceHost, or it can be hosted through IIS .svc hosting.

member.name: T:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract
member.summary: A WCF contract which describes the operations exposes by a DistributedUnitOfWork service.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.Count(System.String)
member.summary: Performs a Count All operation for the specified entity type.
member.param: The fully qualified type for which to return the Count of entity instances.
member.returns: The current count of this entity type which is stored in the database.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.CountQuery(System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Performs a Count operation for the specified entity type based on the provided query.
member.param: The fully qualified type for which to return the Count of entity instances.
The query which is used to provide criteria for the Count operation.
member.returns: The current count of this entity type as filtered by the provided query.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.Calculate(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Performs a Calculate operation for the specified entity type over the nominated attribute.
member.param: The fully qualified type for which to perform the Calculate operation.
The attribute of the entity which the operation is to be performed on.
member.returns: The result of the calculation.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.CalculateQuery(System.String,System.String,System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Performs a Calculate operation for the specified entity type over the nominated attribute with the specified query.
member.param: The fully qualified type for which to perform the Calculate operation.
The attribute of the entity which the operation is to be performed on.
The query which specifies the criteria and filtering to be applied.
member.returns: The result of the calculation.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.CalculateProcedureQuery(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.ProcedureQuery)
member.summary: Performs a Calculate operation using the specified ProcedureQuery.
member.param: The query which specifies the entity type and procedure to be executed.
member.returns: The result of the calculation.
member.remarks: The entity type must be specified in the ProcedureQuery instance.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.Execute(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.ProcedureQuery)
member.summary: Executes a ProcedureQuery and returns the return value of the call.
member.param: The query which specifies the procedure to be executed.
member.returns: The return value from the call.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.FindOne(System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Peforms a FindOne operation for the specified entity type using the specified query.
member.param: The fully qualified type for which to perform the FindOne operation.
The query which specifies the criteria and filtering required.
member.returns: The single entity result returned by the call.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.FindAll(System.String)
member.summary: Performs a FindAll operation for the specified entity type.
member.param: The fully qualified type for which to perform the FindAll operation.
member.returns: The set of all entities of the requested type.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.Find(System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Performs a Find operation for the specified entity type based on the supplied query.
member.param: The fully qualified type for which to perform the Find operation.
member.returns: The set of entities which have been returned as a result of the query.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.FindIdentifiers(System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Performs a Find operation for the specified entity type based on the supplied query where the results are going to be just the identifiers
member.param: The fully qualified type for which to perform the Find operation.
member.returns: The set of entities which have been returned as a result of the query.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.Find(System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.ProcedureQuery)
member.summary: Performs a Find operation using a ProcedureQuery.
member.param: The fully qualified type for which to perform the Find operation.
The procedure query to be executed.
member.returns: The set of entities which have been returned as a result of the query.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.FindTuple(System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query,Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.EntityTypeMapping[])
member.summary: Performs a Find operation where the result set will be spanning multiple types which will be returned as an EntityTuple instance.
member.param: The fully qualified type for the root entity for which to perform the Find operation.
The list of type mappings for the query.
member.returns: An EntityTuple which contains the result sets from the query for each entity type specified.
member.remarks:
This operation is typically called when executing a query where the output is to be multiple types in the query.
e.g. select a.*, b.* from EntityA a inner join EntityB b on a.SomeProperty = b.SomeProperty

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.Project(System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Performs a Find operation where the output is to be a projection across one or more types in the query rather than an entity result.
member.param: The fully qualified type for the root entity for which to perform the Project operation.
member.returns: A RawDataSet containing the raw values from the DataReader which was returned from executing the query.
member.remarks:
This operation is typically called when executing a query where the output is to be an arbitrary shape given the entities involved in the query.
e.g. select a.Id, b.Id from EntityA a inner join EntityB b on a.SomeProperty = b.SomeProperty

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.ProjectToType(System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Performs a Find operation where the output is to be a projection across one or more types in the query rather than an entity result and the resulting projection is to be mapped to a specified type.
member.param: The fully qualified type which to project the results into.
The query to be executed which must contain the entity type.
member.returns: An array of objects of the requested type where the data will be mapped in a 1:1 fashion from the result set against the properties of the type.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.ProcessChanges(Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedChangeBatch)
member.summary: Processes a batch of changes to entities which may contain Add/Remove or Update operations.
member.param: The batch of changes to be executed.
member.returns: A DistributedChangeResult instance which describes the outcome from processing the changes. Any new or updated identifiers will be returned and any validation error messages will be attached.
member.remarks: This is the service equivilant of SaveChanges()

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.Remove(System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Performs a Remove operation based on a specified query.
member.param: The fully qualified type of the entities to be removed.

member.name: E:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.IDistributedUnitOfWorkContract.GeneralFailureOccurred
member.summary: Event which is fired when an unhandled failure occurs within the DistributedUnitOfWorkService allowing you to inspect any exceptions that occur.
member.remarks: This event is fired by the service to allow you to handle any exceptions as all service operations will throw a standard exception back to the client.

member.name: T:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork
member.summary: A distributed version of the UnitOfWork which can be used to process requests against a remote server. The communication between client and server is managed through WCF.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the DistributedUnitOfWork and configures the WCF bindings from application configuration.
member.remarks: You must have an endpoint named LightSpeedDistributedUnitOfWorkEndpoint defined which points to the DistributedUnitOfWork service endpoint. The default context will be used with this overload.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.#ctor(Mindscape.LightSpeed.LightSpeedContext)
member.summary: Initializes the DistributedUnitOfWork and configures the WCF bindings from application configuration.
member.remarks: You must have an endpoint named LightSpeedDistributedUnitOfWorkEndpoint defined which points to the DistributedUnitOfWork service endpoint.
member.param: The LightSpeedContext to be used when creating the DistributedUnitOfWork.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.#ctor(Mindscape.LightSpeed.LightSpeedContext,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes the DistributedUnitOfWork and configures the WCF bindings from application configuration.
member.param: The LightSpeedContext to be used when creating the DistributedUnitOfWork.
The name of the WCF endpoint which points to the DistributedUnitOfWork service endpoint.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.#ctor(Mindscape.LightSpeed.LightSpeedContext,System.ServiceModel.Channels.Binding,System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress)
member.summary: Initializes the DistributedUnitOfWork and configures the WCF bindings using the supplied binding and address.
member.param: The EndpointAddress of the DistributedUnitOfWork service endpoint.
The Binding to be used when communication with the service endpoint.
The LightSpeedContext to be used when creating the DistributedUnitOfWork.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Count(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Returns the number of entities based on the supplied .
member.returns: The number of entities.

example.code: Query query = new Query(typeof(Product), Entity.Attribute("Price") > 1000000); long expensiveProductCount = unitOfWork.Count(query);

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Calculate``1(System.String,System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Performs a database calculation such as COUNT, SUM or AVG.
member.param: A SQL fragment representing the target calculation function. E.g. "SUM".
member.returns: The result of the calculation.

example.code: Query query = new Query(Entity.Attribute("OrderId") == 101); int sumOfPricesInOrder101 = (int)(unitOfWork.Calculate<Product>("SUM", "Price", query));

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Calculate``1(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Performs a database calculation such as COUNT, SUM or AVG.
member.param: A SQL fragment representing the target calculation function. E.g. "SUM".
member.returns: The result of the calculation.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Calculate(System.String,System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Performs a database calculation such as COUNT, SUM or AVG.
member.param: A SQL fragment representing the target calculation function. E.g. "SUM".
member.returns: The result of the calculation.

example.code: Query query = new Query(typeof(Product), Entity.Attribute("OrderId") == 101); int sumOfPricesInOrder101 = (int)(unitOfWork.Calculate("SUM", "Price", query));

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Calculate(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.ProcedureQuery)
member.summary: Performs a database calculation (scalar query) using a database stored procedure.
member.returns: The result of the query.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Calculate(System.String,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.IdentifierExpression,Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Performs a database calculation such as COUNT, SUM or AVG.
member.param: A SQL fragment representing the target calculation function. E.g. "SUM".
member.returns: The result of the calculation.
member.remarks: This overload allows you to specify functions on the attribute over which the calculation is performed. It is rarely used directly: it is normally preferable to use a LINQ query instead.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Detach(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Entity)
member.summary: Detaches the specified from the current unit of work.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.FindOne(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Finds a single that matches the provided specification.
member.returns: The that matches the provided specification.

example.code: Query query = new Query(typeof(Order), Entity.Attribute("Id") == 101); Entity order = unitOfWork.FindOne(query);

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Find``1(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query)
member.summary: Finds the specified query.
member.returns: The results of the query.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Find``1(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.ProcedureQuery)
member.summary: Finds the specified query.
member.returns: The results of the query.

member.returns: A list of objects that match the provided specification.

member.summary: Gets the set of objects that match the provided query specification and returns the results as an grouped by entity type.

member.returns: The results of the grouping.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Find``1(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Querying.Query,``0)
member.summary: Finds the specified query.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Add(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Entity)
member.summary: Registers the specified entity as a pending insert.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Attach(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Entity)
member.summary: Attaches the specified to the current unit of work.

member.name: M:Mindscape.LightSpeed.ServiceModel.DistributedUnitOfWork.Attach(Mindscape.LightSpeed.Entity,Mindscape.LightSpeed.AttachMode)
member.summary: Attaches the specified to the current unit of work using the requested mode for attachment
member.param: The to use when attaching this entity to the UnitOfWork
member.returns: An instance of the entity which has been attached to the current UnitOfWork, see the details for the being used to determine specific behavior of the call
member.remarks: AttachMode.Import is not supported on the DistributedUnitOfWork.
